title: Epstein built ties to Russians and sought to meet Putin, files show
summary_full: Justice Department files show Jeffrey Epstein sought help from a Russian official after claiming a woman from Moscow was blackmailing “powerful businessmen” in New York.
summary_public: Justice Department files show Jeffrey Epstein sought help from a Russian official after claiming a woman from Moscow was blackmailing “powerful businessmen” in New York.

RU.label: neutral
RU.evidence: Epstein built ties to Russians and sought to meet Putin
